Hymn.Arabic:
قال الرب لموسى,
بصوت عالى يناديه,
قوم إصنع لى تابوت,
وبالذهب إطليه
Hymn.English:
The Lord told Moses,
With His voice He cried,
Rise to build an ark,
With gold on all sides
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
qal elrab le Mousa  
Besot 3aly ynadeeh  
qoom esna3 li taboot  
W belzahab etleeh

Hymn.Arabic:
لأوضع فيه سرى,
وأجعل عهدى فيه,
ومن خشب لايُسوِّس,
بالحرير تكسون
Hymn.English:
So therein may dwell,
My pure covenant,
Made with acacia,
With gold all around
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
La2ada3 feeh serrey  
W ag3al 3ahdi feeh  
men khashab la yswess  
Bel7areer taksoon

Hymn.Arabic:
تشبهتِ يا مريم,
بتابوت العهد المطلى,
وفيه القسط ذهب,
بالمن العقلى
Hymn.English:
Mary you are like,
The ark made of gold,
Therein the vessel,
Manna to behold
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Tashabahti ya Mariam  
Betabout el3ahd elmatly  
W feeh elqest zahab  
Belman el3akly

Hymn.Arabic:
مديحك فى فمى,
أحلى من العسل,
نهديكِ كل سلام,
يا إبنة صهيون
Hymn.English:
Your praise on my lips,
Sweeter than honey,
Daughter of Zion,
We praise joyfully
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Madee7ek fe fammy  
A7la men el3asal  
Nohdeeki kol salam  
Ya ebnat Sihyon

Hymn.Arabic:
يا نجمة تضوى,
كمصباح النور,
حملتِ إبن الله,
الحى غير المنظور
Hymn.English:
O you shining star,
The beautiful queen,
You held the Logos,
The Great and unseen
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Ya nagma tadwey  
Ka mesba7 elnour  
7amalti ibn Allah  
El7ay gher elmanzoor

Hymn.Arabic:
وخلصتِ آدم,
بعد أن كان مأسور,
وعاد هو وبنوه,
إلى الفردوس فرحون
Hymn.English:
He has freed Adam,
From captivity,
Returned to Paradise,
Him and his family
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
W khalasti Adam  
Ba3d an kan ma2soor  
W 3ad howa w banoo  
Ela elferdos far7oon

Hymn.Arabic:
نورتِ العالم,
بعد أن كان ظلمة,
وحملتِ فى أحشاكِ,
إبن الله الكلمة
Hymn.English:
You brought light to us,
Who were in darkness,
Bearing in your womb,
The Logos of God
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Nawareti el3alam  
Ba3d an kan zolma  
W 7amalti fe a7shakey  
Ibn Allah el-kalema

Hymn.Arabic:
أنتِ هى التابوت,
أنتِ هى الحكمة,
أنتِ هى قُوَّتنا,
وفرح الصديقون
Hymn.English:
O Mary the ark,
You are the wisdom,
You are our strength,
Gate of the Kingdom
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Anti heya eltaboot  
Anti heya el7ekma  
Anti heya qowetna  
W fara7 elsedeekoon

Hymn.Arabic:
لما أراد الله,
وشاء وإختارك,
وأرسل إليكِ الكلمة,
وبروح قدسه زانك
Hymn.English:
At the fitting time,
The Lord God chose you,
He sent you the Word,
The Spirit dwelt in you
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Lamma arad Allah  
W sha2 w ekhtarak  
W arsal elayki el-kalema  
W beroo7 kodsoh zanek

Hymn.Arabic:
وحملتِ فى أحشاك,
الرب إلهك,
وولدته ورضع لبنك,
كشبه البشريون
Hymn.English:
You bore in your womb,
You blessed woman,
Your God and Savior,
Divine and human
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
W 7amalti fe a7shakey  
Elrab Elahak  
W waladtih w rada3 labanek  
Ka-shebh el-basharion

Hymn.Arabic:
حزقيال تنبأ,
فى رؤياء وقال,
رأيت باباً فى المشرق,
مقفولاً بالأقفال
Hymn.English:
Ezekiel witnessed,
And he testified,
I saw an east door,
Shut tight at all times
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
7ezkeial tanaba2  
Fe ro2ya w qal  
Ra2ayt baban fel mashreq  
Maqfoolan bel-aqfal

Hymn.Arabic:
دخل فيه وخرج,
الملك المتعال,
ولم يمسُّه ضرر,
وبحاله مختومون
Hymn.English:
The high King entered,
Through the eastern door,
It did not alter,
Yet sealed as before
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
Dakhal feehi w kharag  
Elmalek elmot3al
W lam yamesoh darar  
W be7alo makhtoomoon

Hymn.Arabic:
وكم شهدوا عنكِ,
فى نبوات وأمثال,
وسوف يظهر منكِ,
الربُّ المتعال
Hymn.English:
Many spoke of you,
All in one accord,
About the coming,
Of the mighty Lord
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
W kam shahdo 3anki  
Fe nobowat w amthal  
W sawfa yazhar menki  
Elrab elmo3tal

Hymn.Arabic:
ويخلص شعبه,
فى عقب الأجيال,
بكِ نلنا الغفران,
يا شورية هارون
Hymn.English:
To save His people,
Praise God you nations,
Your Son has saved us,
Censer of Aaron
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
W yokhalas sha3bo  
Fe 3aqeb el-agyial  
Beki nolna el-ghofran  
Ya shoryet Haroun

Hymn.Arabic:
السلام لك يا مريم
يا مملؤة نعمة
يا مشتملة بالأنوار 
يا أم الرحمة
إشفعى فينا 
فى يوم الزحمة 
بك نلنا كل خلاص
يـا إبنة صهيون
Hymn.English:
Hail to you Mary
 Engulfed in pure light
  Mother of Mercy
 Your splendor is bright.
Intercede for us
  On the Judgement Day
  Your Son has saved us
  Daughter of Zion
Hymn.ArabicEnglish:
El Salamo laki ya Mariam 
 ya mamlo2a ne3ma 
 ya moshtamla bel anwar 
 ya om elra7ma  
Eshfa3i fina 
 fi yom elza7ma 
 bek nolna kol kholas 
 ya ebnat Sihyon
